Thanks for the catch! Sorry about that. They should be fixed now.
Are you interested in trades at all ? I'm interested in the Danny Hoffman for no reason other than he's from CT. I've got a Harry Davis up for sale or trade if you're interested. No creasing.

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1402026]Are you interested in trades at all ? I'm interested in the Danny Hoffman for no reason other than he's from CT. I've got a Harry Davis up for sale or trade if you're interested. No creasing.[/QUOTE]

Honestly, I'm trying to clear up some capital for some lots I'm going after in an upcoming auction. The Davis is gorgeous, though.

Thanks for the offer.
Burl (Justin Burleson)

I'll take: Moran, Dygert, Berger.

PM me your PP and I'll return with shipping info...
